definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: Let's sing a song during the break.
sentences.chinese: 我们趁这空当儿唱支歌。

sentences.english: Challenge yourself in a classic Minesweeper game for touch devices.
sentences.chinese: 在经典的空当挑战自己的触觉装置比赛。

sentences.english: Villa is a drum ahead into the market, snatching empty when.
sentences.chinese: 别墅市场更是击鼓疾进，抢夺空当。

sentences.english: Young can, after all, be deployed as a secondary striker, a difficult and elusive opponent, finding space, accomplished in front of goal.
sentences.chinese: 杨还可以打二前锋的位置，他可以发现空当完成进球。

sentences.english: In a match situation it's a great technique for finding space.
sentences.chinese: 在比赛中，找空当具有很高的技巧性。

sentences.english: He'll hit open shots but won't create that many.
sentences.chinese: 他能命中空位投篮，但却没有制造空当的能力。

sentences.english: Yet I now find that there is no reason to be ashamed of playing solitaire at work.
sentences.chinese: 但是我发现，上班时玩空当接龙者不必感到羞耻。

sentences.english: A fullback can use the space created by a wing forward.
sentences.chinese: 后卫可以利用边锋制造空当。

sentences.english: The basic reason they became crucial is that they were constantly the only players in any real space.
sentences.chinese: 他们变得重要的基本原因是在场上一直有空当。

definition: gap (between two objects)/interval of time (between events)/opening in one's schedule/free time/(fig.) gap (in the market etc)
crack/gap between two objects/gap in time between two events
to provide support/to come to the rescue
to get out of the way
to ambush/to lie in wait for/to lie low/ambush
to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
gap in coverage/gap in protection or defenses/neglected or overlooked area/dead end
